Sentencas: In-situ characterization of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) under operating conditions is of great significance to mechanism studies on performance or long-term stability.
Titulo: In-situ analysis of anode atmosphere in a flat-tube solid oxide fuel cell operated with dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: In this study, real-time visualization of the twodimensional gas distribution inside a large flat-tube SOFC is realized by built-in gas sampling tubes combined with external gas chromatography, validated by simulating calculation.
Titulo: In-situ analysis of anode atmosphere in a flat-tube solid oxide fuel cell operated with dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: The gas composition inside anode of the cell fueled with CH4/CO2 is in-situ monitored during a 1000-h discharge test.
Titulo: In-situ analysis of anode atmosphere in a flat-tube solid oxide fuel cell operated with dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: Decrease in catalytic activity for methane dry reforming during the long-term test differs at different region of the cell, and is related with local carbon deposition and sintering of Ni particles.
Titulo: In-situ analysis of anode atmosphere in a flat-tube solid oxide fuel cell operated with dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: Based on these experimental results, the mechanism of cell performance degradation of the large flat-tube SOFCs under methane dry reforming conditions is discussed.
Titulo: In-situ analysis of anode atmosphere in a flat-tube solid oxide fuel cell operated with dry reforming of methane
